title: Group portrait of wedding party with six women, including Joyce Claybrook, Gail Jones, Caren Saunders, Paula Pearl, maid of honor Velma Townes, and bride Sandra Pearl Kelsey wearing scalloped lace gown; seven men, including Willie Givens, Cecil Kelsey, Raymond Flacks, LeRoy Wilkerson, Clayburn Hally, best man Paul Hawkins, and groom James Kelsey wearing light colored dinner jacket; flower girl Toni Calloway, and ring bearer Craig Flacks, posed in Nazarene Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
